bug.author: rgiduthuri
bug.summary: Caffe to NNEF converter is generating incorrect tensor file format
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>% od -t x4 -N 32 conv1/filter.dat 0000000 0001ef4e 0000001f 00000004 00000020 0000020 00000003 00000005 00000005 d09c2000 </denchmark-code>
Per Section 5.2 of the spec, the hex dump of tensor file header must look like: <denchmark-code>0000000 0001ef4e 00000020 00000004 00000020 0000020 00000003 00000005 00000005 00002000 </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Indeed, there were two bugs in the exported header (the data offset was wrong, and the quantization string length was missing). I have fixed this, can you check on your side?
Recent commit fixed this issue. Thx
